item.title: Need help with my top hat!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“tor0en, post:1, topic:197558”]hey! i am working on putting in some models to rs… and i got a bit of a problem… i have get the model into the game… but im using the other item aswell… i am trasfering a ghostly hood into a top hat… but im wearing both… so im here to ask you for help…

heres my code that i use

if(i == 6109) { // item id class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 10038; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 100; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 100; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 0; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 10038;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 10038;//female wearing class8.aString170 = "top hat"; class8.aByteArray178 = "u got Fisk's top hat! give it back!".getBytes(); }[/quote]

Change the item id so you can wear both?Like;

if(i == 6109) {

Into

if(i == ####) {

Change the #### to your desired id?I don’t know if you mean that but,worth a try

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my top hat!

item.title: Need help with my top hat!
item.dc:creator: @tor0en tor0en
item.description:
@tor0en wrote:

hey! i am working on putting in some models to rs… and i got a bit of a problem… i have get the model into the game… but im using the other item aswell… i am trasfering a ghostly hood into a top hat… but im wearing both… so im here to ask you for help…

heres my code that i use

if(i == 6109) { // item id class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 10038; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 100; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 100; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 0; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 10038;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 10038;//female wearing class8.aString170 = "top hat"; class8.aByteArray178 = "u got Fisk's top hat! give it back!".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my top hat!
